item.description:
For those who want to meet and ride together to the Jockey club ....

Meet: Derby Shops
100 Derby St
Hingham

Meeting time: 930 am leave at 10 am.

Details for the charity ride:

Southeastern Massachusetts Motorcyclists’ Survivors Fund
www.SEMMSF.org ~ www.BriansRideFriends.org
Proceeds from this event will be used to help Southeastern
Massachusetts families of motorcycle accidents victims and to
promote motorcycle safety awareness.

Staging: 9:30 AM - Ride leaves Noon Sharp!!
The Jockey Club, 115 New State Hwy, Rte 44 Raynham, MA

$15 PP Pre-Registration, $20 PP at the gate.

Admission includes lunch, vendors, bike games and other activities.
Live entertainment by Mike Ardolino & Prism and Junior and the Back 40
Bikes aren’t necessary - All are welcome!!!
WCTK 98.1 WILL BE BROADCASTING LIVE FROM BRIAN’S RIDE!!!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Brian's Ride
